benchmark_details.name: DafnyComp
benchmark_details.overview: DafnyComp is a benchmark of compositional formal programs with auto-formalized specifications for specification reasoning.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the compositional reasoning ability of formal language coding and improve the verification of generated Dafny specifications.

data.source: Automatic generation of formal specifications from Python functions and existing Dafny data.
data.annotation: Automatically annotated using models without human intervention.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are defined based on the proportion of correct specifications and verification success.
methodology.interpretation: Higher rates indicate better performance in generating valid and useful specifications.
methodology.baseline_results: SFT models exceeded baseline metrics, significantly outperforming proprietary models like GPT-4.
methodology.validation: Regular automation checks through a verification pipeline using Dafny.
